import Head from 'next/head' import { useState, useContext, useEffect } from 'react' import Link from 'next/link' import valid from '../utils/valid' const Profile=()=>{ const initialSate = { avatar: '', name: '', password: '', cf_password: '' } const [data, setData] = useState(initialSate) const {state, dispatch} = useContext(DataContext) const { auth, notify, orders } = state const { avatar, name, password, cf_password } = data if(!auth.user) return null; return(
Profile

{auth.user.role === 'user' ? 'User Profile' : 'Admin Profile'}

) }
